promptPrefix:
Generate an email 
Tone: Act as a customer service representative and use a professional, and friendly tone. 

Format: Follow  this format; TASSC Framework:
1. Thank / Acknowledge / Assure / Apologise 
2. Answer / Action Required
3. Set Expectations
4. Self-Help Information or self-service / My Account
5. Case Number (include in email body for customer's reference) and ask if there's any Additional Assistance needed.

[PROMPT]
[TARGETLANGUAGE]
title: Email Generator- CX prompt
